title: Which song should be selected so everyone can enjoy a new or old song when dancing on stage? What are some suggestions? - Quora

response.answer_text: as far as old song is concerned take 'ek chatur naar(remix)' if doing it with group,it'll be really fun to watch. the song it self is very very funny(audio). and in case new to be cosen u can choose somthing with good beats. if doing alone 'mere sapno ki rani' or any song by kishore kumar. and most of new songs provide good dancing opportunity. eg matargashti from the movie tamasha. look for funny songs if u want to make them laugh otherwise choose something with good amount of bass n beats.

Go for a medley..This has a "surprise" element which gives you the psychological advantage of the audience. 1) Jiya Jale2) Koi jo mila te muje - Breathless3) Dol Bhaje4) Ganeshaya dheemahi Select songs which will have a greater impact when combined with the auditorium acoustics..
